Subject: Update on the Team Meeting
Body:
,

We’re planning to hold a team meeting to discuss the upcoming project deadlines and workload distribution. Can you confirm your availability for 1:00 p.m. today? If there’s anything specific you’d like to discuss, feel free to let me know so I can add it to the agenda.

Thanks,
Julia

Subject: New Intern Introduction
Body:
,

I’m pleased to let you know that our new intern, Jordan Lee, is starting on Monday! As you’ll be working closely with them, I’d appreciate it if you could take a few minutes to introduce yourself and help them get oriented. If you have any tips on projects they can begin with, please share those with them as well.

Let me know if you have any questions, or feel free to drop by my office for more information.

Thanks for your support!
Anna

Subject: Last-Minute Report Request
Body:
,

I know this is last-minute, but I could really use your help with the quarterly financial report. Could you confirm if you have the latest figures for the last quarter? If so, could you send the key numbers over to me by the end of the day? Otherwise, let me know if there’s a delay, and I’ll follow up with the finance team.

Thanks in advance for your help!

Best,
Derek

Subject: Reminder: Friday’s Office Event
Body:
,

This is a quick reminder about the upcoming team-building event on Friday. We’re planning a casual lunch in the office lounge starting at noon, followed by a few team activities. Let me know if you’ll be joining us, and if you have any dietary preferences or restrictions, so I can pass the information to catering.

Looking forward to seeing you there!
Carlos

Subject: Quick Check-in: Project Status
Body:
,

I wanted to check in on the status of the presentation materials for the client review next week. Are we on track to have everything ready by Wednesday? If there are any challenges or adjustments to the timeline, please let me know.

Appreciate the update!

Thanks,
Lisa

Subject: Client Feedback Needed
Body:
,

One of our clients, Pinnacle Group, recently completed their Q3 service cycle with us, and I’d like to reach out for feedback. Could you draft a polite email we can send them asking about their experience? Keep it open-ended so we can get insights into any areas for improvement.

If you have any questions, let me know!

Best,
Sean

Subject: Document Formatting Issue
Body:
,

I noticed that a couple of the slides in our presentation file you seem to have some formatting issues. Could you send me a list of issues that need to be fixed in the presentation? 

Thanks so much!
Paula

Subject: Invoice Question from Vendor
Body:
,

One of our vendors reached out about a recent invoice they received, which had a few discrepancies. Could you double-check the invoice for any errors and let me know what needs updating? We’d like to avoid any back-and-forth, so I’d appreciate it if you could handle it quickly.

Thanks,
Thomas

Subject: Assistance with Filing System
Body:
,

I’m working on reorganizing our digital filing system. It would save me a lot of time if you could point me to the most accurate names or file structure we should use.

Thanks so much for your help!
Sophie
